name: Shopify
description: Shopify e-commerce platform integration with comprehensive store management capabilities

actions.name: Test Connection
actions.description: Test the connection to Shopify and verify authentication

shop.description: Metadata about the connected Shopify shop

apiVersion.description: Shopify Admin API version used for the request

actions.name: Create Product
actions.description: Create a new product in Shopify store

actions.name: Get Product
actions.description: Retrieve a specific product by ID

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve

products.description: List of products returned from the Shopify API

nextPageInfo.description: Opaque cursor for retrieving the next page of results

actions.name: Get Order
actions.description: Retrieve a specific order by ID

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve

nextPageInfo.description: Opaque cursor for retrieving the next page of results

actions.name: Fulfill Order
actions.description: Create a fulfillment for an order

actions.name: Update Inventory
actions.description: Update inventory levels for a variant

triggers.name: Order Created
triggers.description: Triggered when a new order is created

triggers.name: Order Updated
triggers.description: Triggered when an order is updated

watch_properties.description: Specific properties to watch for changes

changes.description: Fields that changed in the update

triggers.name: Order Paid
triggers.description: Triggered when an order is paid

triggers.name: Product Created
triggers.description: Triggered when a new product is created

triggers.name: Customer Created
triggers.description: Triggered when a new customer is created
